Cleveland.Wolfe Music Building:
The three-story, neoclassical Wolfe Music Building at 2112 Euclid Avenue in Cleveland, Ohio was designed by the well-known, Cleveland-based architecture firm Walker and Weeks in 1927.


== History ==
The Wolfe Music building was built in 1927 to house the Wolfe Music store, founded in 1917 by Harry Wolfe. The commercial building itself was owned and developed by Anthony Carlin.
